languages.text: {n}Арджента поворачивается к пастве, ее голос наполняется огнем истовой веры.{/n} "Слуги Императора! Дети Человечества! Будьте крепки в своем упорстве и чисты в своей вере, ибо избавление уже близко! Укрепите свои сердца, ибо каждого из нас ждет испытание, наградой за которое станет свобода!"

{n}Argenta turns to her audience, and her voice fills with zealous fire:{/n} "Servants of the Emperor! Children of Humanity! Be strong in your resolve and pure in your faith, for our deliverance is at hand! Steel your hearts, for a great trial lies ahead of us all, but the reward for passing it is freedom!"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента поворачивается к пастве, ее голос наполняется огнем истовой веры.{/n} "Слуги Императора! Дети Человечества! Будьте крепки в своем упорстве и чисты в своей вере, ибо избавление уже близко! Укрепите свои сердца, ибо каждого из нас ждет испытание, наградой за которое станет свобода!"

Be strong in your resolve and pure in your faith, for our deliverance is at hand! Steel your hearts, for a great trial lies ahead of us all, but the reward for passing it is freedom!"

Be strong in your resolve and pure in your faith, for our deliverance is at hand! Steel your hearts, for a great trial lies ahead of us all, but the reward for passing it is freedom!"

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは聴衆に向き直る。彼女の声には炎のような熱気がこもっている。{/n}「皇帝のしもべたち！人類の子らよ！決意を固め、信仰に純粋であれ。我々の自由は目前に迫っている！心を強く持て。大きな試練が待ち受けているが、それを乗り越え自由を得るのだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta turns to her audience, and her voice fills with zealous fire:{/n} "Servants of the Emperor! Children of Humanity! Be strong in your resolve and pure in your faith, for our deliverance is at hand! Steel your hearts, for a great trial lies ahead of us all, but the reward for passing it is freedom!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは聴衆に向き直る。彼女の声には炎のような熱気がこもっている。{/n}「皇帝のしもべたち！人類の子らよ！決意を固め、信仰に純粋であれ。我々の自由は目前に迫っている！心を強く持て。大きな試練が待ち受けているが、それを乗り越え自由を得るのだ！」

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔转向她的听众，声音中充满了热情的火焰。{/n}“帝皇的仆人！人类的子嗣！坚定你们的决心，净化你们的信念，因为我们的救赎就在眼前！你们必须坚定信仰，因为我们面临着极其艰巨的考验，但只要通过了这场考验，自由便尽在手中！”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta turns to her audience, and her voice fills with zealous fire:{/n} "Servants of the Emperor! Children of Humanity! Be strong in your resolve and pure in your faith, for our deliverance is at hand! Steel your hearts, for a great trial lies ahead of us all, but the reward for passing it is freedom!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔转向她的听众，声音中充满了热情的火焰。{/n}“帝皇的仆人！人类的子嗣！坚定你们的决心，净化你们的信念，因为我们的救赎就在眼前！你们必须坚定信仰，因为我们面临着极其艰巨的考验，但只要通过了这场考验，自由便尽在手中！”

languages.text: {n}Argenta se vuelve hacia su público y su voz se llena de un fuego fervoroso.{/n} «¡Sirvientes del Emperador! ¡Hijos de la Humanidad! ¡Conservad la fuerza de vuestra determinación y la pureza de vuestra fe, pues nuestra liberación está cerca! ¡Templad vuestros corazones para la gran prueba que nos espera, pues la recompensa por superarla será la libertad!».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta turns to her audience, and her voice fills with zealous fire:{/n} "Servants of the Emperor! Children of Humanity! Be strong in your resolve and pure in your faith, for our deliverance is at hand! Steel your hearts, for a great trial lies ahead of us all, but the reward for passing it is freedom!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta se vuelve hacia su público y su voz se llena de un fuego fervoroso.{/n} «¡Sirvientes del Emperador! ¡Hijos de la Humanidad! ¡Conservad la fuerza de vuestra determinación y la pureza de vuestra fe, pues nuestra liberación está cerca! ¡Templad vuestros corazones para la gran prueba que nos espera, pues la recompensa por superarla será la libertad!».

languages.text: {n}Argenta wendet sich ihrem Publikum zu und ihre Stimme füllt sich mit fanatischem Feuer.{/n} "Diener des Imperators! Kinder der Menschheit! Seid stark in Eurer Entschlossenheit und rein in Eurem Glauben, denn unsere Erlösung naht! Stählt Eure Herzen, denn eine große Prüfung liegt vor uns allen, doch die Belohnung ist die Freiheit!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta turns to her audience, and her voice fills with zealous fire:{/n} "Servants of the Emperor! Children of Humanity! Be strong in your resolve and pure in your faith, for our deliverance is at hand! Steel your hearts, for a great trial lies ahead of us all, but the reward for passing it is freedom!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta wendet sich ihrem Publikum zu und ihre Stimme füllt sich mit fanatischem Feuer.{/n} "Diener des Imperators! Kinder der Menschheit! Seid stark in Eurer Entschlossenheit und rein in Eurem Glauben, denn unsere Erlösung naht! Stählt Eure Herzen, denn eine große Prüfung liegt vor uns allen, doch die Belohnung ist die Freiheit!"

languages.text: {n}Elle se tourne vers son audience et déclame d'une voix pleine de ferveur ardente :{/n} « Serviteurs de l'Empereur ! Enfants de l'humanité ! Ne laissez ni votre détermination ni votre foi faiblir, car l'heure de la délivrance est proche ! Et surtout, gardez courage ! Une terrible épreuve nous attend, mais elle mène sur le chemin de la liberté ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta turns to her audience, and her voice fills with zealous fire:{/n} "Servants of the Emperor! Children of Humanity! Be strong in your resolve and pure in your faith, for our deliverance is at hand! Steel your hearts, for a great trial lies ahead of us all, but the reward for passing it is freedom!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle se tourne vers son audience et déclame d'une voix pleine de ferveur ardente :{/n} « Serviteurs de l'Empereur ! Enfants de l'humanité ! Ne laissez ni votre détermination ni votre foi faiblir, car l'heure de la délivrance est proche ! Et surtout, gardez courage ! Une terrible épreuve nous attend, mais elle mène sur le chemin de la liberté ! »

languages.text: {n}Argenta, onu dinleyenlere dönüyor. Sesi, hararetli bir imanla yanıp tutuşuyor.{/n} "İmparator'un hizmetkârları! İnsanlığın evlatları! Kararlılığınızı yitirmeyin, inancınıza leke sürmeyin zira kurtuluşumuzun eli kulağındadır! Yürekli olun, zira ateşten gömlek giyeceğiz ancak nihayetinde hürriyetimizle ödüllendirileceğiz!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta turns to her audience, and her voice fills with zealous fire:{/n} "Servants of the Emperor! Children of Humanity! Be strong in your resolve and pure in your faith, for our deliverance is at hand! Steel your hearts, for a great trial lies ahead of us all, but the reward for passing it is freedom!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, onu dinleyenlere dönüyor. Sesi, hararetli bir imanla yanıp tutuşuyor.{/n} "İmparator'un hizmetkârları! İnsanlığın evlatları! Kararlılığınızı yitirmeyin, inancınıza leke sürmeyin, zira kurtuluşumuzun eli kulağında! Yürekli olun, zira ateşten gömlek giyeceğiz ancak nihayetinde hürriyetimizle ödüllendirileceğiz!"
